reviewText: Someone, no doubt, has it in for the writer / director and in all probability Ryan O'Neal.  This movie is one of the best if not "THE BEST" gambling films ever made!  All gamblers and "gambler wannabes" needs to see this.  If it should ever go to DVD I alone will buy three of them!
The acting is poor, the storyline is weak.  There are much better movies out there that deal with the topic of gambling addiction.

If you like to gamble this is a good movie to watch. Its a cult favorite among true hard core gamblers. I am still hoping they get this on DVD one day. Hey Vernon Vaughn this ones for you. Do you gamble? Are you Lucky?

This is one of the worst movies to come out of the 1980s. But it's so bad that for pure laughs, it's great! Terrible dialogue, inappropriate music, and bad story line all contribute to make this a clunker.
So spring for the 50 cents if you see it at a yard sale, it's an experience!
